content: Will it break mathport to move an theorem (and the corresponding align) to another file? I'm asking this in the context of #5501 in which I'm doing exactly that, because I'd like to know wether the corresponding mathlib3 PR !3#17298 needs to be merged first, or if I can just stick to Lean4.
mathport uses #align statements. It doesn't really care where the lemma lives.
Anatole Dedecker has marked this topic as resolved.
